popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

popupAnnouncementTreatment.ctaText: Watch your crypto grow with Pooled Staking. Stake your crypto and earn rewards for securing the Ethereum network.

seo.pageTitle: Staking Simplified with MetaMask Institutional: A Comprehensive Guide
seo.pageDescription: Secure Ethereum's Future: Understand the Importance of Staking in the Ecosystem.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Staking is crucial to the security of the Ethereum ecosystem.
For this reason, MetaMask Institutional seeks to facilitate broader institutional web3 participation by bringing together best-in-class staking service providers for a simple one-click staking experience.

Choosing the right staking service provider can be challenging for organizations. Each provider offers different infrastructure configurations (multi-cloud, multi-region, and multi-client), reporting standards, fee structures, and terms and conditions. They also boast different certifications.

MetaMask Institutional addresses this complexity by streamlining access to top-tier institutional staking providers with standardized T&Cs, comprehensive reporting templates, and a significantly simplified staking experience.

Consensys is a leading Ethereum and decentralized protocols software company. We enable developers, enterprises, and people worldwide to build next-generation applications, launch modern financial infrastructure, and access the decentralized web. Our product suite, composed of Infura, Quorum, MetaMask, MetaMask Institutional, Diligence, and our NFT platform, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets. Ethereum is the largest programmable blockchain in the world, leading in business adoption, developer community, and DeFi activity. On this trusted, open-source foundation, we are building the digital economy of tomorrow.

Consensys Staking enables web3 participants to secure the Ethereum network and earn rewards for staking ETH—by making staking secure, reliable, and accessible.

node.headline: Top-Tier Institutional Staking Service Providers
